markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Stone Communion](/Feats.aspx?ID=894) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</column>

---

You gain a unique communion with the earth and stones. You learn the [Terran](/Languages.aspx?ID=22) language and you can Activate your _ka stone_ with a 10-minute activation (envision) to cast [_stone tell_](/Spells.aspx?ID=310).
name: Stone Communion
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
You can speak Terran and speak with stones.
</summary>
summary: You can speak Terran and speak with stones.
